documents.document: @Telegraph @TelegraphNews We need a leader like Mr Trump in the UK to clean this country up street by street, house by house.
@Telegraph There is no confusion. Another lie from the Lying Press. The new rule is very straightforward.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews 1.5 million signed the petition - how many of them are postal voters?
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews Mr Trump should visit Rotherham to see what might happen to the US if he doesn't ban them.
@Telegraph @TelegraphTech Breed as fast as possible, take the country over innit...
@royalsociety Many people don't seem to understand the importance of Mr Heaviside and Mr Faraday. We must resurrect them.
@Telegraph Another reason why State funded education should be abolished.
@Telegraph The Whitehall regime has a cheek thinking it can tell people how to raise their kids.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews Ban the burka. No more mosques that preach hatred against Europe.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews A British citizen then rather than an actual Briton.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews It isn't controversial. More lies from the Lying Press.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews Mr Duterte has the right idea. He is cleaning up his country street by street, house by house.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews There should be a cartoon showing what might happen to the USA without the ban.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews Mr Trump's ban isn't chaotic. More lies from the Lying Press.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews It is very ironic that these perpetually offended people want to ban someone from coming to the UK.
@Telegraph The Whitehall regime doesn't give a toss about the welfare of the British people.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews Japs were interned during WW2. It is sensible to intern the enemy during a war.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews Shut down the mosques where the Muslims spout their hatred against us.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews Why are they all so desperate to get to the USA? There are lots of other countries on Earth.
@Telegraph Most predators have to show themselves just before they attack their prey.
@Telegraph Rob Crilly obviously hasn't been paying attention. Mr Trump has said that he is going to destroy ISIS/Islamic State.
@Telegraph If Japan couldn't beat the United States during WW2 then what chance does 'Islamic State' have?
@Telegraph The next logical step is to close down the mosques. No more mosques!
@Telegraph Mr Trump should add Saudi Arabia and Pakistan to the ban list.
@Telegraph Commie Merkel probably wants the US to experience terror attacks like Berlin, Paris, Nice, London, Madrid etc.
@HerrDoktor10 @Telegraph The Conservative Party must be abolished as soon as possible.
@Telegraph The judge is disobeying Mr Trump's order.
@Telegraph Nadhim should definitely be banned.
@Telegraph @DavidGauke America won't exist in 50 years time. It will be Ameristan. The White House will be turned into a mosque.
@Telegraph @DavidGauke 'Let us Muslims into your country or we will blow you up!'
@TelePolitics Taqiyya - Islamic deception. They claim that war is deception.

@Telegraph He should be banned from the UK as well.

@Telegraph More lies from the Lying Press. It isn't chaos. The new rules seem very straightforward.

@AlanMurrayArt @Telegraph @TelegraphNews It won't be labelled. Just the same way that meat & milk created using GM feed isn't labelled.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews GP have a conflict of interest because they are paid cash when they don't send someone to hospital.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews GPs would be less stressed if they spent less time with their accountants hiding their money offshore
@Telegraph What a load of rubbish.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews Just wait until Mr Trump tries to force the UK to accept imported American chlorine washed chicken.
@Telegraph The next important step after BREXIT is to not sign any trade deal with the United States.

@cyclist_london The councils don't even know how many wood burning stoves are actually installed in UK homes.
@Telegraph The UK won't need so many teachers after BREXIT.
@Telegraph State funded education in the UK deliberately fails millions of British children. It should be abolished.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews All of the Labour held constituencies should have new elections without postal votes being allowed.

@Telegraph @TelegraphNews All cars should be retrofitted with electric regenerative braking systems to reduce brake dust air pollution.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews We need a national 'sewer' system for air pollution. Home gas boilers could pipe their exhaust into it.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews The solution is to capture the vehicle exhaust pollution in a storage tank.

@Telegraph They are just going to bomb them to grab their oil.

@Telegraph @TelegraphNews We need to build a wall around Donald Trump and put bars in the window.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews Just wait until Mr Trump invades Mexico.
@Telegraph @TelegraphNews We will build a wall around May & Trump and put bars in the window.

@Telegraph @TelegraphNews The British people are being suffocated by the Whitehall regime. The Whitehall regime is the problem.

@Telegraph The rest of the world should build a wall around the United States to contain the American terrorists there.

@Telegraph Mexico should build a wall to ensure that American terrorists cannot enter Mexico. It works both ways Mr Trump.
@Telegraph Mexico should build its own wall to keep the American terrorists out.
